name: v0.6.1
body:
## What's Changed
* add skeleton identity verification flow for tpm 2.0 without idevid by @gh4683 in https://github.com/openconfig/attestz/pull/166
* implement verifyHMAC and add tests by @gh4683 in https://github.com/openconfig/attestz/pull/168
* implement verifyCertifyInfo and add test by @gh4683 in https://github.com/openconfig/attestz/pull/170
* Implement the function GenerateRestrictedHMACKey() and its test. by @Chounoki in https://github.com/openconfig/attestz/pull/171
* reorganize verifyIdenity by @gh4683 in https://github.com/openconfig/attestz/pull/174
* leftover from previous renaming of the VerifySignature() by @muntazirsal in https://github.com/openconfig/attestz/pull/176
* Implement function RSAEKPublicKeyToTPMTPublic and its test. by @Chounoki in https://github.com/openconfig/attestz/pull/175
* Fixing bug with extra bytes being appended to the Identity Request on device side by @muntazirsal in https://github.com/openconfig/attestz/pull/177

## New Contributors
* @Chounoki made their first contribution in https://github.com/openconfig/attestz/pull/171

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/openconfig/attestz/compare/v0.6.0...v0.6.1

name: v0.6.0
body:
## What's Changed
* Fix generated pb files to be consistent with the proto definitions by @dsiganos in https://github.com/openconfig/attestz/pull/71
* enrollz: add getIdevidCsr and challenge to enrollz proto by @gh4683 in https://github.com/openconfig/attestz/pull/70
* enrollz: add nonce verification logic and tests by @gh4683 in https://github.com/openconfig/attestz/pull/72
* Revert "enrollz: add nonce verification logic and tests" by @betuls in https://github.com/openconfig/attestz/pull/73
* enrollz: add nonce verfication logic and tests by @gh4683 in https://github.com/openconfig/attestz/pull/74
* add parsing of TCG-CSR-IDevID contents by @gh4683 in https://github.com/openconfig/attestz/pull/76
* Adding space for TEST by @muntazirsal in https://github.com/openconfig/attestz/pull/79
* Revert "Adding space for TEST" by @muntazirsal in https://github.com/openconfig/attestz/pull/81
* add stubs for RotateAIK() by @gh4683 in https://github.com/openconfig/attestz/pull/80
* complete idevid parser logic by @gh4683 in https://github.com/openconfig/attestz/pull/78
* add key enum to proto message GetIdevidCsrRequest by @gh4683 in https://github.com/openconfig/attestz/pull/83
* add streaming messages and app identity req structures to enrollz_biz by @gh4683 in https://github.com/openconfig/attestz/pull/82
* implement ParseSymmetricKeyParms and add related structs by @gh4683 in https://github.com/openconfig/attestz/pull/84
* implement ParseRSAKeyParms by @gh4683 in https://github.com/openconfig/attestz/pull/86
* chore: Configure Renovate by @renovate-bot in https://github.com/openconfig/attestz/pull/87
* Adding ROT client to the logic for RotateAIKCert logic for TPM1.2 with no IDevID by @muntazirsal in https://github.com/openconfig/attestz/pull/85
* implement ParseKeyParms by @gh4683 in https://github.com/openconfig/attestz/pull/88
* chore(deps): update com_google_googleapis digest to f410c8c by @renovate-bot in https://github.com/openconfig/attestz/pull/89
* chore(deps): update openconfig/common-ci digest to 004dd5f by @renovate-bot in https://github.com/openconfig/attestz/pull/90
* Revert "chore(deps): update openconfig/common-ci digest to 004dd5f" by @marcushines in https://github.com/openconfig/attestz/pull/105
* fix(deps): update module github.com/golang/glog to v1.2.5 by @renovate-bot in https://github.com/openconfig/attestz/pull/92
* Update go.yml by @marcushines in https://github.com/openconfig/attestz/pull/103
* make a new interface for TPM 1.2 enrollment infra deps by @gh4683 in https://github.com/openconfig/attestz/pull/104
* update go.sum to fix mismatch on go mod tidy by @marcushines in https://github.com/openconfig/attestz/pull/108
* chore(deps): update com_google_googleapis digest to bc9d698 by @renovate-bot in https://github.com/openconfig/attestz/pull/95
* chore(deps): update dependency bazel to v8.3.1 by @renovate-bot in https://github.com/openconfig/attestz/pull/96
* chore(deps): update dependency bazel_features to v1.33.0 by @renovate-bot in https://github.com/openconfig/attestz/pull/97
* chore(deps): update dependency bazel_gazelle to v0.44.0 by @renovate-bot in https://github.com/openconfig/attestz/pull/98
* chore(deps): update protobuf monorepo to v29.5 by @renovate-bot in https://github.com/openconfig/attestz/pull/112
* fix(deps): update module google.golang.org/protobuf to v1.36.6 by @renovate-bot in https://github.com/openconfig/attestz/pull/93
* chore(deps): update dependency bazel_skylib to v1.8.1 by @renovate-bot in https://github.com/openconfig/attestz/pull/99
* chore(deps): update dependency com_github_grpc_grpc to v1.74.0 by @renovate-bot in https://github.com/openconfig/attestz/pull/100
* chore(deps): update dependency gazelle to v0.44.0 by @renovate-bot in https://github.com/openconfig/attestz/pull/101
* chore(deps): update dependency grpc to v1.74.0 by @renovate-bot in https://github.com/openconfig/attestz/pull/102
* chore(deps): update dependency io_bazel_rules_go to v0.56.0 by @renovate-bot in https://github.com/openconfig/attestz/pull/109
* Update Renovate config by @bstoll in https://github.com/openconfig/attestz/pull/118
* chore(all): update protobuf monorepo to v31 (major) by @renovate-bot in https://github.com/openconfig/attestz/pull/117
* chore(all): update deps by @renovate-bot in https://github.com/openconfig/attestz/pull/119
* make tpm 12 utils an interface by @gh4683 in https://github.com/openconfig/attestz/pull/94
* implement DecryptWithPrivateKey by @gh4683 in https://github.com/openconfig/attestz/pull/121
* chore(all): update actions/checkout action to v5 by @renovate-bot in https://github.com/openconfig/attestz/pull/125
* Implementing ParseSymmetricKey by @muntazirsal in https://github.com/openconfig/attestz/pull/123
* implement ParseIdentityRequest by @gh4683 in https://github.com/openconfig/attestz/pull/122
* add serialize functions to support construction of TPM_IDENTITY_CONTENTS by @gh4683 in https://github.com/openconfig/attestz/pull/127
* removing ROTDBClient from the EnrollzInfraDeps by @muntazirsal in https://github.com/openconfig/attestz/pull/131
* chore(all): update protobuf monorepo to v32 (major) by @renovate-bot in https://github.com/openconfig/attestz/pull/133
* implement ConstructIdentityContents by @gh4683 in https://github.com/openconfig/attestz/pull/128
* convert AIK key bytes to pem and add to issueAikCertReq by @gh4683 in https://github.com/openconfig/attestz/pull/134
* Implement helper functions for ParseIdentityProof() by @muntazirsal in https://github.com/openconfig/attestz/pull/129
* use tink to create AES key and encrypting with it by @gh4683 in https://github.com/openconfig/attestz/pull/135
* Adding in the ParseIdentityProof() by @muntazirsal in https://github.com/openconfig/attestz/pull/130
* chore(all): update deps by @renovate-bot in https://github.com/openconfig/attestz/pull/120
* change aes key generation and encryption to cbc by @gh4683 in https://github.com/openconfig/attestz/pull/137
* Refactoring tpm_utils_test.go  by @muntazirsal in https://github.com/openconfig/attestz/pull/132
* implement construction and serialization of AsymCaContents by @gh4683 in https://github.com/openconfig/attestz/pull/141
* Implementing VerifySignatureWithRSAKey() by @muntazirsal in https://github.com/openconfig/attestz/pull/143
* Implement EncryptWithPublicKey() by @muntazirsal in https://github.com/openconfig/attestz/pull/144
* Add check and test for empty data bytes by @muntazirsal in https://github.com/openconfig/attestz/pull/145
* Add key to challenge request by @adityasingh-anet in https://github.com/openconfig/attestz/pull/138
* chore(all): update deps by @renovate-bot in https://github.com/openconfig/attestz/pull/142
* Allow writing to status for CI checks by @bstoll in https://github.com/openconfig/attestz/pull/148
* added edge cases for SerializeKeyParms and refactored test by @gh4683 in https://github.com/openconfig/attestz/pull/146
* use SymCAAttestation in RotateAIK by @gh4683 in https://github.com/openconfig/attestz/pull/147
* chore(all): update module google.golang.org/grpc to v1.75.1 by @renovate-bot in https://github.com/openconfig/attestz/pull/150
* Add test vector for EncryptWithAES() by @muntazirsal in https://github.com/openconfig/attestz/pull/149
* DecryptWithSymmetricKey with crypto/aes  by @seal6363 in https://github.com/openconfig/attestz/pull/139
* Add/Correct comments for tpm12_utils.go by @gh4683 in https://github.com/openconfig/attestz/pull/152
* Remove WORKSPACE files by @swufygoog in https://github.com/openconfig/attestz/pull/151
* Fix for DecryptWithSymmetricKey()  by @muntazirsal in https://github.com/openconfig/attestz/pull/155
* chore(all): update dependency protobuf to v32.1 by @renovate-bot in https://github.com/openconfig/attestz/pull/154
* Fixing bug for malformed ConstructIdentityContents() by @muntazirsal in https://github.com/openconfig/attestz/pull/156
* fixing exponent assignment for PubKey construction by @muntazirsal in https://github.com/openconfig/attestz/pull/159
* add proto changes for TPM 2.0 w/o IDevID enrollment by @gh4683 in https://github.com/openconfig/attestz/pull/158
* adding error handling for exponent=0 and undoing previous fix by @muntazirsal in https://github.com/openconfig/attestz/pull/160
* fixing comment for DER Scheme by @muntazirsal in https://github.com/openconfig/attestz/pull/163
* add workaround for IV bug by @gh4683 in https://github.com/openconfig/attestz/pull/164
* add GetControlCardVendorID RPC by @gh4683 in https://github.com/openconfig/attestz/pull/161
* add changes to RotateOIakCertRequest proto to support atomic rotation by @gh4683 in https://github.com/openconfig/attestz/pull/167

## New Contributors
* @dsiganos made their first contribution in https://github.com/openconfig/attestz/pull/71
* @betuls made their first contribution in https://github.com/openconfig/attestz/pull/73
* @muntazirsal made their first contribution in https://github.com/openconfig/attestz/pull/79
* @renovate-bot made their first contribution in https://github.com/openconfig/attestz/pull/87
* @adityasingh-anet made their first contribution in https://github.com/openconfig/attestz/pull/138
* @seal6363 made their first contribution in https://github.com/openconfig/attestz/pull/139
* @swufygoog made their first contribution in https://github.com/openconfig/attestz/pull/151

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/openconfig/attestz/compare/v0.5.0...v0.6.0

name: v0.5.0
body:
## What's Changed
* Bump golang.org/x/net from 0.36.0 to 0.38.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/openconfig/attestz/pull/63
* Allow either chassis or control card serial number in response by @zasweq in https://github.com/openconfig/attestz/pull/64
* Add example to calculate PCR Digest value by @zasweq in https://github.com/openconfig/attestz/pull/65
* fix: add parsing of serial number in VerifyTpmCert by @gh4683 in https://github.com/openconfig/attestz/pull/67
* Support Bazel8/bzlmod by @bstoll in https://github.com/openconfig/attestz/pull/66
* Add fields for enrollz flow by @marcushines in https://github.com/openconfig/attestz/pull/69

## New Contributors
* @zasweq made their first contribution in https://github.com/openconfig/attestz/pull/64
* @gh4683 made their first contribution in https://github.com/openconfig/attestz/pull/67
* @bstoll made their first contribution in https://github.com/openconfig/attestz/pull/66

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/openconfig/attestz/compare/v0.4.0...v0.5.0

name: v0.4.0
body:
## What's Changed
* Bump github.com/golang/glog from 1.2.0 to 1.2.4 by @dependabot in https://github.com/openconfig/attestz/pull/56
* proto: compile _grpc.pb.go files by @brianneville in https://github.com/openconfig/attestz/pull/57
* Bump golang.org/x/net from 0.33.0 to 0.36.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/openconfig/attestz/pull/60
* Support attestation of devices with TPM 1.2 by @nmahabaleshwar in https://github.com/openconfig/attestz/pull/59
* Add control card identity to TPM 1.2 enrollz flow by @nmahabaleshwar in https://github.com/openconfig/attestz/pull/61
* Specify that PCR values, quotes and signature should be raw bytes. by @avanpo in https://github.com/openconfig/attestz/pull/62

## New Contributors
* @brianneville made their first contribution in https://github.com/openconfig/attestz/pull/57
* @nmahabaleshwar made their first contribution in https://github.com/openconfig/attestz/pull/59
* @avanpo made their first contribution in https://github.com/openconfig/attestz/pull/62

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/openconfig/attestz/compare/v0.3.0...v0.4.0

name: v0.3.0
body:
## What's Changed
* Bump golang.org/x/net from 0.18.0 to 0.23.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/openconfig/attestz/pull/42
* Make idevid optional during iak and idevid validation by @melzhan in https://github.com/openconfig/attestz/pull/43
* remove use of cmp.diff by @melzhan in https://github.com/openconfig/attestz/pull/44
* change cert serial format by @melzhan in https://github.com/openconfig/attestz/pull/45
* Serial by @melzhan in https://github.com/openconfig/attestz/pull/46
* Add experimental flag to skip oidevid rotation by @melzhan in https://github.com/openconfig/attestz/pull/47
* Update the proto comments to explain when idevid is used and clarify cert chain expectation by @melzhan in https://github.com/openconfig/attestz/pull/48
* enrollz_biz_test: ignore unexported fields from x509.VerifyOptions by @melzhan in https://github.com/openconfig/attestz/pull/50
* Bump golang.org/x/net from 0.23.0 to 0.33.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/openconfig/attestz/pull/53
* Update CODEOWNERS by @marcushines in https://github.com/openconfig/attestz/pull/54
* Add support for TPM1.2 enrollment. by @marcushines in https://github.com/openconfig/attestz/pull/52
* Cleanup some words used in the documentation, mostly: by @morrowc in https://github.com/openconfig/attestz/pull/55

## New Contributors
* @morrowc made their first contribution in https://github.com/openconfig/attestz/pull/55

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/openconfig/attestz/compare/v0.2.0...v0.3.0

name: v0.2.0
body:
## What's Changed
* Add generated grpc Go files by @jenia-grunin in https://github.com/openconfig/attestz/pull/14
* Update codeowners of core enrollz and attestz proto definitions by @jenia-grunin in https://github.com/openconfig/attestz/pull/15
* Add attestz-committers team to default approvers by @jenia-grunin in https://github.com/openconfig/attestz/pull/17
* Fix generated go libs importpath by @jenia-grunin in https://github.com/openconfig/attestz/pull/16
* Update crypto algo requirements to align with the latest TCG spec by @jenia-grunin in https://github.com/openconfig/attestz/pull/18
* Wire enrollz and switch-owner-CA clients to biz logic by @jenia-grunin in https://github.com/openconfig/attestz/pull/19
* Configure github builds to run tests and typo checks by @jenia-grunin in https://github.com/openconfig/attestz/pull/20
* Enrollz to update switch's default SSL profile for initial attestz and certz by @jenia-grunin in https://github.com/openconfig/attestz/pull/21
* fix typo: IDevID and oIDevID certs rely on the same IDevID pub key by @jenia-grunin in https://github.com/openconfig/attestz/pull/22
* Default/reference impl of IAK and IDevID cert verifier and parser by @jenia-grunin in https://github.com/openconfig/attestz/pull/23
* Generate certs/keys in tests of TpmCertVerifier on the fly by @jenia-grunin in https://github.com/openconfig/attestz/pull/24
* Add more tests for TpmCertVerifier by @jenia-grunin in https://github.com/openconfig/attestz/pull/25
* Cert validation with vendor ca trust anchors by @jenia-grunin in https://github.com/openconfig/attestz/pull/26
* Support post-install workflow to rotate Owner IAK certs by @jenia-grunin in https://github.com/openconfig/attestz/pull/27
* Implement TpmCertVerifier.VerifyTpmCert() by @jenia-grunin in https://github.com/openconfig/attestz/pull/28
* Pass control card ID to TPM cert verifier by @jenia-grunin in https://github.com/openconfig/attestz/pull/29
* Wrap all requests and responses of SwitchOwnerCaClient by @jenia-grunin in https://github.com/openconfig/attestz/pull/31
* Fix lint issues by @melzhan in https://github.com/openconfig/attestz/pull/30
* Fix more lint issues by @melzhan in https://github.com/openconfig/attestz/pull/32
* Fix unexported fields and verify requests by @jenia-grunin in https://github.com/openconfig/attestz/pull/33
* remove certVerificationOpts.Roots nil check by @jenia-grunin in https://github.com/openconfig/attestz/pull/34
* Add context.Context to all interfaces by @jenia-grunin in https://github.com/openconfig/attestz/pull/35
* fix executable bit on shell and add .bazelversion so it pinned to by @marcushines in https://github.com/openconfig/attestz/pull/37
* Bump google.golang.org/protobuf from 1.32.0 to 1.33.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/openconfig/attestz/pull/39
* Add diagrams with code structure and usage of various packages by @jenia-grunin in https://github.com/openconfig/attestz/pull/38
* Fix step 9 to specifically create a seperate ssl profile from by @marcushines in https://github.com/openconfig/attestz/pull/36
* Add SSL profile ID to EnrollControlCardReq by @jenia-grunin in https://github.com/openconfig/attestz/pull/41
* Set port for enrollz and attestz gRPC endpoints by @jenia-grunin in https://github.com/openconfig/attestz/pull/40

## New Contributors
* @melzhan made their first contribution in https://github.com/openconfig/attestz/pull/30
* @dependabot made their first contribution in https://github.com/openconfig/attestz/pull/39

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/openconfig/attestz/compare/v0.1.0...v0.2.0

name: First Release of Enrollz and Attestz
body:
## What's Changed
* add linters by @marcushines in https://github.com/openconfig/attestz/pull/1
* Initial TPM 2.0 enrollment proto APIs by @jenia-grunin in https://github.com/openconfig/attestz/pull/2
* Create CODEOWNERS by @dplore in https://github.com/openconfig/attestz/pull/6
* Document TPM 2.0 enrollment workflow by @jenia-grunin in https://github.com/openconfig/attestz/pull/4
* Clarify documentation on TLS cert usage by @jenia-grunin in https://github.com/openconfig/attestz/pull/7
* Add guidelines on what to attest by @jenia-grunin in https://github.com/openconfig/attestz/pull/8
* Quoted part of TPM2_Quote() response should be of type TPM2B_ATTEST by @jenia-grunin in https://github.com/openconfig/attestz/pull/10
* Set expectations for TPM 2.0 asym crypto algorithms by @jenia-grunin in https://github.com/openconfig/attestz/pull/9
* Update CODEOWNERS file by @jenia-grunin in https://github.com/openconfig/attestz/pull/13
* Initial setup for enrollz service by @jenia-grunin in https://github.com/openconfig/attestz/pull/12

## New Contributors
* @marcushines made their first contribution in https://github.com/openconfig/attestz/pull/1
* @dplore made their first contribution in https://github.com/openconfig/attestz/pull/6

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/openconfig/attestz/commits/v0.1.0
